statements: SELECT * FROM DrugComparison;
SELECT drug_id, drug_name FROM DrugComparison WHERE new_drug_outcome='Positive';
SELECT drug_id, drug_name, established_treatment_outcome FROM DrugComparison WHERE drug_id=3;
SELECT * FROM DrugComparison ORDER BY drug_name DESC;
SELECT drug_name, new_drug_outcome FROM DrugComparison WHERE established_treatment_outcome='Negative' ORDER BY drug_name ASC;
SELECT drug_name, new_drug_outcome FROM DrugComparison WHERE drug_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM DrugComparison WHERE drug_name LIKE 'Aspirin%';
SELECT drug_name, established_treatment_outcome FROM DrugComparison WHERE new_drug_outcome = 'Positive order by drug_name ASC';
SELECT drug_name, established_treatment_outcome FROM DrugComparison ORDER BY established_treatment_outcome DESC, drug_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_drugs FROM DrugComparison;
SELECT * FROM drug_trials;
SELECT trial_id, drug_name, efficacy_score FROM drug_trials WHERE efficacy_score > 0.8;
SELECT drug_name, outcome FROM drug_trials ORDER BY trial_id DESC;
SELECT trial_id, drug_name FROM drug_trials WHERE drug_name IN ('Drug A', 'Drug B');
SELECT * FROM treatment_protocols ORDER BY effectiveness_rating ASC;
SELECT * FROM drug_trials WHERE efficacy_score > 0.8;
SELECT drug_name, efficacy_score FROM drug_trials WHERE outcome = 'Successful';
SELECT * FROM treatment_protocols WHERE effectiveness_rating >= 3.5 ORDER BY protocol_id DESC;
SELECT protocol_name, notes FROM treatment_protocols WHERE effectiveness_rating < 2.5;
SELECT drug_name, efficacy_score, outcome FROM drug_trials WHERE efficacy_score > 0.5 AND outcome = 'Positive' ORDER BY trial_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM drugs;
SELECT drug_name, dosage FROM drugs WHERE dosage > 50;
SELECT outcome_name FROM outcomes WHERE outcome_id = 2;
SELECT treatment_protocol, drugs.drug_name, outcomes.outcome_name FROM treatments JOIN drugs ON treatments.drug_id = drugs.drug_id JOIN outcomes ON treatments.outcome_id = outcomes.outcome_id;
SELECT drug_name, dosage FROM drugs ORDER BY dosage DESC;
SELECT drug_name, dosage FROM drugs WHERE drug_id = 1
SELECT outcome_name FROM outcomes WHERE outcome_id = 2
SELECT drug_name, dosage, outcome_name FROM drugs INNER JOIN treatments ON drugs.drug_id = treatments.drug_id INNER JOIN outcomes ON treatments.outcome_id = outcomes.outcome_id
SELECT drug_name, outcome_name FROM drugs, treatments, outcomes WHERE drugs.drug_id = treatments.drug_id AND treatments.outcome_id = outcomes.outcome_id AND drug_id = 3
SELECT * FROM drugs ORDER BY drug_name DESC
SELECT * FROM Drugs;
SELECT drug_name, efficacy_score FROM Drugs WHERE efficacy_score > 0.5;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE age < 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT drug_name, treatment_name, duration_in_weeks FROM Drugs JOIN Treatments ON Drugs.drug_id = Treatments.treatment_id;
SELECT patient_name, outcome_score FROM Patients JOIN Outcomes ON Patients.patient_id = Outcomes.patient_id WHERE outcome_score < 0.5;
SELECT * FROM Drugs;
SELECT drug_name, efficacy_score FROM Drugs ORDER BY drug_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT drug_name, efficacy_score FROM Drugs WHERE efficacy_score > 0.8;
SELECT t.treatment_name, p.patient_name, o.outcome_score FROM Treatments t JOIN Outcomes o ON t.treatment_id = o.treatment_id JOIN Patients p ON o.patient_id = p.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM Drugs;
SELECT drug_name, drug_type FROM Drugs WHERE production_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT treatment_name, cost FROM Treatments ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT comparison_description FROM Comparison_Outcomes WHERE comparison_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM Drugs;
SELECT drug_name, production_date FROM Drugs ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis FROM Patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT treatment_name, cost, effectiveness_score FROM Treatments WHERE cost < 100 AND effectiveness_score > 70;

SELECT d.drug_name, p.patient_name, t.treatment_name FROM Drugs d JOIN Drug_Outcomes do ON d.drug_id = do.drug_id JOIN Patients p ON do.patient_id = p.patient_id JOIN Treatments t ON do.treatment_id = t.treatment_id;
